title: LaTeX 作業模板

content: 好欸， Paddy HQ 正式上線啦 🥳🥳 這裡之後會放我的日常，比如修課紀錄以及一些活動的心得等等，敬請期待～
title: First Post

content: Hi there! I’m Paddy Yu-Syuan Lee, a 🇹🇼 Taiwanese sophomore majoring in Computer Science. Welcome to my portfolio website! I’m currently serving as the Vice President of the NTU CSIE Council and the General Coordinator of the 2025 NTU CSIE Night—one of the largest events organized by the NTU CSIE Council. Starting in August 2025, I will take on the role of the 48th President of the NTU CSIE Council and serve as the Director of the Information Department at Topedia International Education Co., Ltd. I enjoy connecting with people from diverse backgrounds, exchanging experiences, and sharing perspectives. Looking forward to meeting you!
title: About Me

content: Education B.S. in Computer Science & Information Engineering, National Taiwan University (Expected: June 2027)
title: About Me

content: Experience Vice Student President, NTU CSIE Council, 2024.08 - Present General Coordinator, 2025 NTU CSIE Night, 2024.09 - Present Teaching Assistant, Data Structures and Algorithms, 2025.02 - Present Lecturer, Olympiad Training Program, Kang Chiao International School, Xiugang Campus, 2024.09 - Present
title: About Me
